techmeme.title: Meta disagrees with OSI's definition of open-source AI; Llama doesn't fit the definition due to restrictions on commercial use and lack of training data access (Kylie Robison/The Verge)

Microsoft says Google runs "shadow campaigns" to discredit it with regulators in Europe, including organizing an "astroturf group" with European cloud providers (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
